attributes.action: Trigger a General Election based on "Brexit" manifestos
attributes.additional_details: No party has a clear plan for "Brexit".  Once the leadership contests are out of the way, each party should create a manifesto based on their plans to leave the EU and for the country to deal with the challenges that this will inevitably bring and allow the people to decide who is best suited to facing this unprecedented challenge.
attributes.background: The "Brexit" referendum has given the government of this country a clear mandate to take this country out of the EU.  Now all party's should create a manifesto based on this mandate, including a plan for exit and beyond and put it to the people in a General Election
